'''A Meeting of Melodies''' is a subevent during [[Iridescent Arataki Rockin' for Life Tour de Force of Awesomeness]].

It involves selecting the appropriate notes to complete the song. Three clefs are used: treble, alto, and bass. The notes do, re, mi, fa, so, la, ti correspond to C, D, E, F, G, A, B on the musical scale (for C major).

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Iridescent Arataki Rockin' for Life Tour de Force of Awesomeness A Meeting of Melodies 1.png
|text1  = During "A Meeting of Melodies," you must choose the most suitable note from of a selection of notes to fit into the empty spaces of a track to match the hummed melody of the original song.
}}
